src:
Ini Tujuan Interpelasi ke Gubernur Kaltim Isran Noor
06 Nov 2019, 00:11 by Danu Damarjati
Jakarta - Lima fraksi DPRD Kalimantan Timur menggulirkan usulan interpelasi terhadap Gubernur Kalimantan Timur Isran Noor. Apa tujuan anggota Dewan menggunakan hak interpelasi ini?
Lima fraksi di DPRD yang menjadi inisiator pengusulan interpelasi adalah fraksi PDIP, PKB, Partai Golkar, PPP, dan PKS. Ketua Fraksi PKB Syafruddin menjelaskan tujuan interpelasi ini bukan untuk melengserkan Isran Noor dari kursi Gubernur Kaltim.
"Hanya meminta keterangan Gubernur," kata Syafruddin kepada wartawan, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Para anggota DPRD pendukung interpelasi itu mempertanyakan sikap Isran Noor yang menunjuk M Sabani sebagai Plt Sekretaris Daerah Provinsi Kalimantan Timur. Padahal, pemerintah pusat telah melantik Abdullah Sani sebagai Sekretaris Daerah Provinsi lewat Keputusan Presiden (Keppres) Nomor 133/TPA Tahun 2018.
"Ini hanya melaksanakan fungsi checks and balances terhadap Gubernur," kata Syafruddin.
text:
This is the purpose of the Interpellation to East Kalimantan Governor Isran Noor
Nov 6 2019, 00:11 by Danu Damarjati
Jakarta - Five East Kalimantan DPRD factions rolled out the proposed interpellation of East Kalimantan Governor Isran Noor. What is the purpose of Board members using this interpellation right?
The five factions in the DPRD who were the initiators of the proposed interpellation were the PDIP, PKB, Golkar Party, PPP and PKS factions. PKB Faction Chair Syafruddin explained the purpose of the interpellation was not to remove Isran Noor from the East Kalimantan Governor's seat.
"Just asking for the Governor's statement," Syafruddin told reporters on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
The DPRD members who supported the interpellation questioned Isran Noor's attitude of appointing M. Sabani as Acting Regional Secretary of East Kalimantan Province. In fact, the central government has installed Abdullah Sani as Provincial Secretary through a Presidential Decree (Keppres) No. 133 / TPA 2018.
"This only carries out the checks and balances function for the Governor," said Syafruddin.
